page.title: 19MAY DAY HOLIDAY IN KINNEFF
page.content: I got up at 8.30a.m. My mum got up at 6.30a.m. so that she could open up the Little Chef Cafe where she works. I played on my computer from 9a.m. to 10a.m. Then my dad, my sister and I went down to{Dunnottar Castle}for an hour. After that we went home for our lunch. Then we went to a{museum in {Glenesk.}My friend came with us. When we reached the museum it was closed so we went to Edzell for refreshments. We set off again in my dad's car. We then went for a walk for 2 miles. After that we went back to the car and drove home. We arrived at 6.00p.m. and had our tea. When we finished our tea my mum came home. I went to bed at 10.15p.m. after watching a film on T.V.
